title: Villanova hosting 'welcome celebration' Tuesday following NCAA championship win
title_page: Villanova hosting 'welcome celebration' Tuesday following NCAA championship win
maintext:
By Staff
The Villanova Wildcats will be welcomed home with open arms Tuesday evening as they return to campus with a third NCAA championship title.
Classes at Villanova University have been canceled after the late-night 79-62 win on Monday against the Michigan Wolverines. The teamâ€™s previous titles were won in 2016 and 1985.
Continue reading on Philly.com
